Basic:
import {
  Editable,
  EditableArea,
  EditableCancelTrigger,
  EditableControl,
  EditableEditTrigger,
  EditableInput,
  EditableLabel,
  EditablePreview,
  EditableSubmitTrigger,
} from '@ark-ui/solid'
import { useEditable } from './use-editable'

const Basic = () => (
  <Editable placeholder="Enter">
    {(api) => (
      <>
        <EditableLabel>Label</EditableLabel>
        <EditableArea>
          <EditableInput />
          <EditablePreview />
        </EditableArea>
        <EditableControl>
          {api().isEditing ? (
            <>
              <EditableSubmitTrigger>Save</EditableSubmitTrigger>
              <EditableCancelTrigger>Canvel</EditableCancelTrigger>
            </>
          ) : (
            <EditableEditTrigger>Edit</EditableEditTrigger>
          )}
        </EditableControl>
      </>
    )}
  </Editable>
)
